title: The meaning of the name Ayoub in a dream

preview.html: Job is a masculine name, meaning: one who returns to God and returns. From the verb yab. It is the name of the Prophet Ayoub, the Prophet of the righteous. He referred to the Holy Qur’an by saying: “And Job, when he called on his Lord, he afflicted me, and you are the Most Merciful of the Most Merciful.” [Al-Anbiya’: 83] Job is also a Hebrew name that means Aib, referring to God or the repentant, and he is an example of patience, perseverance, perseverance, and prudence. As for the name Job in Interpretation of dreams. It means patience, dream, insight and conviction. He sees the patient and the meaning as well as the prisoner and the oppressed. As well as the expatriate and the traveler. It means back and forth. It is said that the name refers in the vision to bring the dreamer out of adversity. This name is praised in most of its manifestations when pronounced, heard and written. He is also praised when you see a character in a dream named Ayoub. Job - may God bless him and grant him peace - in a dream Seeing it shows secrecy. Perhaps his vision indicates what came out of his hand in the form of money or a child. Perhaps the dreamer fell on the right side. If the fortuneteller falls ill, he will be cured of his illness, and his illness will be taken away from him, and he will have what he hopes for in a prayer or a needy question. Whoever wears the clothes of Job - peace be upon him - in a dream will experience ease and joy in suffering. He meets loved ones and a lot of money, and people praise him. It was said that his dreams indicate high status and a crowd praising glory and reward. If a woman sees in her dream the wife of Ayoub - peace be upon him - this indicates that her money will be restored, the harm will be removed from her, and that her money will end well and safely. And if he sees her sick, he will be cured, and God Almighty will forbid, or may God have mercy on him, and reveal his evil because her name is Mercy. The meaning of the name Ayoub in a dream is a single woman. Ayoub in one dream symbolizes patience, calculation, and prudence and portends death. The causes of psychological and physical problems if one sees this name written or hears it in a dream . Or if he sees in a dream someone calling him or her. It is one of the psychologically reassuring names for those who are frightened or frightened, in addition to being a sign of the recovery of the sick. This name also promises the arrival of good news if Job appears smiling or happy and is flattered to see him shaking her hand, exchanging congratulations with her, or blessing her. It is often believed that seeing this name in a dream is because it is the name of a prophet. The meaning of the name Ayoub in a dream for a married woman is one of the good names that are praised when heard or written. It is worthy of praise for someone who married someone she knows named Ayoub (her husband’s neighbor, colleague, or friend). It is in the interpretation of the death of anguish, sadness and adversity. Read also: Seeing a neighbor in a dream If he enters her house, he will enter security and if something happens to her diet, it will be interpreted as an increase in income. If he gives her a key, the vision appears near relief. If she announces pregnancy, she will become pregnant. Read also: The key in the dream. If he gives her bills, this is his interpretation of money. The same applies if he gives her water to drink, a loaf of ripe bread, or a piece of candy. It is good to see a married woman marrying a man named Ayoub, provided that he is not one of her mahrams. If he is one of her mahrams, then there is nothing wrong with the dream if the marriage is without marriage and without building... Read also: Paper money in a dream, meaning of the name Ayoub in a dream

title: Interpretation of a dream about renting a large house by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about renting a large house by Ibn Sirin. Home is defined as a place where a person lives and feels safe and stable. Other people may share it, such as living with family members under the same roof. They share conversations with each other and discuss the smallest details of their lives. They grieve over each other's grief. They live in one house as if they were one body, and many situations occur between them that remain engraved in the family's memory and its existence in life, which is the building block and foundation of society, an important thing, especially if it is a family united by bonds of love, tenderness and respect, and in which there is an atmosphere of understanding. In fact, the house has many valuable and valuable meanings, and an individual can dream of living in a house with some elements in it, and many want to know the interpretation of the dream of renting a large house by Ibn Sirin, and the following interpretations about it.Interpretation of seeing renting a house in a dream: The house is the headquarters and stable in which one lives There are people in it most of their time, and the house is the place where a person spends most of his life, and the memory of that person remains throughout the house even after his death, and the person can obtain the house either by owning or renting. The following is the interpretation of seeing renting a house in a dream: A dream of renting indicates A house in a dream indicates that there are many promising things that await the dreamer soon. The dream of seeing a house for rent in a dream indicates that there are many changes that will occur in the dreamer’s life that will change his life for the better. Renting a house in a dream means that the dreamer will travel somewhere Or he changes his home to settle in another house. Seeing renting a house also indicates that the dreamer will face new obligations in his life. Seeing someone renting some of his own property in a dream means stability, security, and freedom from fear and anxiety. While seeing rent being paid, it is one of the praiseworthy visions that indicate That the dreamer’s owner will improve his financial circumstances for the better. Renting a house or moving to a new house indicates a desire to settle down with a life partner away from any family problems or interference. See also: Interpretation of a dream about divorcing my wife and marrying another person in a dream according to Nablus. Interpretation of a dream about searching for New Home: A person is interested in making many changes in his life in order to feel refreshed, monotonous and bored in his life. Perhaps one of the most obvious changes one can make is to move or buy a new home, especially if this home has many attractive qualities such as its location, views, and space. The following is the interpretation of a dream about searching for a new home: Seeing a dream about searching for a new home means that the dreamer He will accept many new jobs that will bring about many positive changes in his life. The dream of searching for a new home indicates the dreamer’s desire for stability and to stay away from any of the problems and pressures that disrupt his current life. The vision of searching for a new home symbolizes that the dreamer is living a stable period of Where emotional, psychological and material stability. One's vision indicates research

title: Interpretation of seeing a balloon in a dream

preview.html: I like it Fans Subscribers Fans Interpretation of seeing a balloon in a dream in detail. It is a bag filled with air or light gas to lighten its load and it flies in the air and in the sky. Its shapes, sizes and colors vary, and it is always used in situations and children who love to play with it rejoice. Today we present the interpretation of seeing a ball to seasoned scholars and interpreters and its meaning Seeing it in a dream in detail. To see a balloon in a dream by Ibn Sirin. To see in a dream a balloon, according to the interpretation of the scholar Ibn Sirin, is that it is a symbol of excitement and disappointment. In the event that you see a balloon exploding in a dream, it is a sign of the coming of renewed good hope. Seeing a large number of balloons in a dream indicates arrogance. And a sense of self. Anyone who sees a balloon flying in the sky is a sign of quick success, but it is temporary and ends. Whoever sees himself throwing a ball into the air, it is a sign of a spirit of adventure and adventure. Seeing playing with a ball in a dream means that the dreamer will enter a new project, but it will exceed his capabilities. Vision A colored balloon in a dream for Al-Osaimi Sheikh Al-Osaimi interprets seeing a balloon in a dream based on its color. He said that colored balloons generally symbolize happiness and pleasure. Seeing a red balloon indicates a storm. As for a white ball, it is a sign of purity of intention and a feeling of joy. The black color symbolizes deception and hypocrisy. Balloon color Green indicates the continuation of the disaster. Seeing a yellow balloon means a lot of money. Dreaming about seeing a black and white ball is a sign of the dreamer’s inability to make decisions. Meaning of seeing a balloon explode in a dream When one dreams of seeing a balloon explode in a dream and make a loud noise, this is a sign that something is happening The dreamer does not expect it. Who sees himself doing? Blowing up a balloon indicates for himself the goals that he seeks to achieve in his life. Usually seeing a balloon explode in a dream, renewed hope in the same light. Interpretation of seeing a balloon rising in the sky. Seeing the balloon rising to the sky is a significant increase in it. It shows the circumstances surrounding the viewer that he can overcome. Because it causes him stress. Perhaps the vision indicates the dreamer’s desire not to confront and escape the issues surrounding him. The meaning of dreaming about blowing up a balloon in a dream. Bombing a balloon in a dream is a sign of the dreamer’s goals that he was unable to achieve. Because this is a clear indication of the nervous pressure the viewer is experiencing due to his immediate financial condition. Meaning Seeing a balloon in a dream: Whoever dreams of a ball in a ball shows his effort to overcome difficulties. It may symbolize the dreamer’s loss of the ability to control the course of his life. Interpretation of seeing a balloon in a dream for a woman: A colored balloon for singles, meaning engagement. The bursting of a balloon: for attending a wedding, it symbolizes the disappearance of stress. Football, for pregnant women: it symbolizes a lot of Wealth for newborns. Add the dream you want to interpret with reference to the family situation in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of a dream about my mother following me in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of my mother running after me in a dream. You are searching for the interpretation of a dream of my mother running after me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of my mother running after me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of my mother running after me in a dream could indicate the mother’s fear of her son, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees the mother chasing him, it may lead to... That indicates bad behavior, and God knows all that is unseen. If an unmarried girl sees her mother chasing her in a dream, it can express wrong actions, and God knows the unseen. Likewise, if a married woman sees a mother following her, this may indicate some wrong actions that she is doing, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream where my mother spat in my face in a dreamInterpretation of a dream in which my mother spat in my face in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this. However, seeing spitting in a dream could be a sign of money and wealth, and God knows the unseen, while seeing someone spitting in your face may indicate harm to the dreamer, and God knows the unseen. If a young man sees someone spitting in his face in a dream, this may indicate On bad words about the dreamer, and God knows everything that he did not see. If a married man sees his mother wanting to kill him in a dream, this may be evidence of committing sins, and God knows all that no one has seen. If a married woman sees a mother wanting to kill her, this may lead her That leads to committing sins and disobedience, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about betrayal by an unmarried woman from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the betrayal of an unmarried woman. Betrayal is one of the unacceptable and unsuitable things in life, and when the dreamer sees that someone close to him is betraying him, he is shocked and afraid and may wish that it was just a dream and not a single person. Another, and here we discover together what the commentators said about this vision. Interpretation of a dream of betrayal of an unmarried woman Seeing the betrayal of an unmarried woman in a dream indicates that she is satisfied with the strong relationship and the cohesive relationship between them and the appreciation that he gives her. If a girl dreams that she is cheating, this means that she is doing some bad things in her life and she must give them up so that they do not cause her problems. If the dreamer sees betrayal in a dream, this symbolizes that he is living a period of tension, stress and severe sadness and wants to marry someone he loves. When a girl sees that she is being betrayed, this indicates that there are many haters and enemies around her who are destroying her evil. When a girl sees that she is married and her partner is cheating on her with her friend, this indicates that she is in contact with someone who does not suit her and will soon break up with him. If a girl sees her close friend cheating on her despite ten years between them, this means that she lives in an atmosphere of tension and severe tension. Scientists believe that a girl who sees her fiancé cheating on her is not necessarily a bad sign, but she can feel the love and friendship between them. The Secrets Dream Interpretation website is a website specialized in interpreting dreams in the Arab world. Just type the Asrar Dream Interpretation website in Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of a dream of Ibn Sirin's betrayal of an unmarried woman The great scholar Ibn Sirin says that seeing betrayal in a dream leads to many pressures and problems in the dreamer's life. If the Virgin Mary sees that a member of her family has betrayed her, this symbolizes that she is going through the most difficult trials and tribulations, but she will soon leave them. If the dreamer sees that she is betraying her friends, this means that they do not appreciate her or love her, and she must be careful of them and stay away from them in reality. Also, seeing betrayal and deception in an unmarried woman's dream means that something bad will happen in her life and it will be difficult to get rid of it. When she sees in her dream the betrayal of a girl, it is interpreted as being surrounded by many conspirators and fraudsters who wish her harm. Interpretation of a dream of repeated betrayal of a single person The interpretation of a dream of betrayal of an engaged girl repeatedly indicates that she fears separation from this person due to the many problems and disputes between them. If an unmarried woman sees that she has deceived her friend and regrets it, this symbolizes the good reputation she enjoys, And purity and chastity. Interpretation of a dream about a lover’s betrayal in a single person If an unmarried girl sees that her lover is betraying her, this means that she has strong feelings of love towards him, but she fears that he will leave her and she is thinking of moving away from him and divorcing him permanently. This makes her see this in her dream, and if the girl sees that her lover is betraying her and she is crying loudly, this foretells the death of sadness and anxiety and the state of their good circumstances and will continue

Interpretation of a dream about betrayal of a lover in a single If an unmarried girl sees that her lover is cheating on her, this means that she has feelings of love She is strong towards him, but she is afraid that he will leave her, and she is thinking of staying away from him and getting divorced permanently. It makes her see this in her dream, and if the girl sees that her lover is cheating on her and she is crying loudly, this foretells the death of sadness and anxiety and the state of their good circumstances will continue.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing Surat Al-Tawbah in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Tawbah in a dream by Ibn Sirin: The great scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin says: If a person sees in a dream that he is reading Surat Al-Tawbah in a dream, this means that his problems are over. Also, writing Surat Al-Tawbah in a dream indicates the marriage of the Prophet and the marriage of the Qur’an that is close to him, as It indicates distance from disobedience and sins. Also, seeing Surat Al-Tawbah in a dream indicates stability and the death of troubles and indicates faith in God Almighty and the Prophet’s repentance from sins. Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Tawbah in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is reading Surat Al-Tawbah, this indicates On her close marriage to a good and upright person. Also, dreaming of reciting Surat Al-Tawbah indicates the success and excellence that an unmarried girl will achieve, in which she will shine. Also, seeing Surat Al-Tawbah recited over a dead person is evidence of the disease that afflicts an unmarried girl and he will be saved from it. Seeing Surat Al-Tawbah Its repetition in a dream indicates the collapse of the worries and differences that the girl sees in her dream, as well as happiness and pleasure. Interpretation of a dream about Surat Al-Tawbah for a married woman: If a married woman sees in her dream that she is reading Surat Al-Tawbah, this indicates the disappearance of her worries, the achievement of her goals, and the improvement of her situation. Likewise, if she sees The married woman herself reads Surat Al-Tawbah in a dream, which means that her marriage and the birth of a new child will be healthy. Also, seeing Surat Al-Tawbah in a dream indicates marital happiness that the woman will see in her life and indicates the disappearance of worries and sins. Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Tawbah in a dream for a man if he sees A married man sees in a dream that the day he reads Surat Al-Tawbah, this indicates the removal of his worries and problems and joining a new job. And if an unmarried man sees him reading Surat Al-Tawbah, this indicates his closeness to a beautiful girl who is good to God. Also, seeing Surat Al-Tawbah in a dream is for men. It shows the kindness of those around him and also shows the profits that he will make from her trade. Seeing Surat Al-Tawbah in a dream indicates a person’s victory over enemies and getting rid of them as quickly as possible, whether they are relatives or friends. Interpretation of Surat Al-Tawbah in a dream for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman dreams of reading Surat Al-Tawbah in In a dream, it means that she will be cured of all diseases, and it also indicates that she will give birth easily. Also, a vision from Surat Al-Tawbah appears dead in a dream for a pregnant woman and this person was her husband. This vision indicates a serious illness, and God knows best. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and a team of experts will respond to you as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing an orphanage in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing an orphanage in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Seeing an orphanage in a dream could indicate the death of money and livelihood, and it could indicate infertility affecting men and girls, and God knows best. Whoever sees an orphanage in a dream, this indicates a serious illness that afflicts him and he will not recover from it, and God knows best. Also. Seeing a shelter and a garden in a dream about a stranger indicates the temptations and many obstacles that a person experiences in his life. Also, seeing an orphanage in a dream for an unmarried girl indicates the collapse of her worries, her close marriage to a man she loves, and happiness in her life. Interpretation of seeing a house For orphans in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl dreams that she is going to an orphanage with a strange man, this indicates a lack of trust in her friends and relatives, and God knows best. Also, seeing a shelter in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates the disappearance of her worries and her faith in God Almighty, and it also indicates the cessation of difficulties in life. Her life. Also, seeing an orphanage for an unmarried girl indicates her close marriage to a young man with a handsome, pious and religious face, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing an orphanage in a dream for married people: If a married woman sees in her dream that she is going to the shelter, this indicates worries, sorrow, and the imprisonment of a relative. Seeing An orphanage in a dream for a married woman is evidence of the end of the problems she was going through in the following period with her husband. Also, seeing gifts for an orphanage in a dream for a woman is an unwanted vision that indicates many problems, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing an orphanage in a dream for a man if he dreams One man sees in a dream that he is demolishing the shelter, then this indicates the sins that he commits in his life, and God knows best. The interpretation of a man seeing orphans in a dream is evidence that God will save him from the difficult stage in which he was living. Also, seeing gifts for the orphanage in a dream is one of the visions. Which indicates the problems and worries that the man suffers from. Also, seeing a shelter in a man’s dream is a sign that his affairs will improve and he will be in a better condition than he was in the past. Interpretation of seeing a child in a dream: Seeing adopting a child in a dream means that the dreamer is suffering from some psychological problems. And materialism during this period of his life, and God knows best. It is also a dream that shows the worries and difficulties that the dreamer is going through, but these things will improve and return to normal. The vision of adopting beautiful children shows the ink of the dreamer’s life, the death of misfortunes and disputes, and his recovery from diseases soon. Interpretation of seeing an orphan being fed In a dream, if one sees in a dream that he is feeding an orphan, this indicates the collapse of his worries and the high status that he will attain. Also, seeing an orphan being beaten in a dream indicates disobedience and sins that the dreamer commits in his life and does not return to God. Seeing a poor orphan indicates that a new baby will come. To its family, and it shows the death and sadness of this newborn. Interpretation of a dream of wiping an orphan’s head. If one sees in a dream that he is wiping an orphan’s head, this indicates the illness that the dreamer will face in his life and also indicates death. Interpretation of seeing an orphan’s head and

title: Interpretation of seeing a date in a dream for a married woman according to Ibn Sirin, seeing eating dates in a dream for a married woman, and seeing dates in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: Seeing dates in a dream for a married womanInterpreters believe that the dream is good and carries many positive interpretations, but it may also symbolize some negative connotations. Seeing dates in a dream for a married womanInterpretation of seeing a date in a dream for a married woman is evidence of an increase in her money and her enjoyment of happiness and security within the limits of her husband, and if If the dreamer eats dates, this indicates her success in her work and in managing the affairs of her home, a great hope for her husband. It is said that distributing dates in a dream symbolizes that a married woman will soon attend the wedding of one of her friends and have a good time, and this will lead to her working in a prestigious and wonderful job in the future. Nearby. Collecting dates in the vision indicates the fulfillment of desires, response to invitations, or immediate pregnancy, if the dreamer is planning and expecting that. Seeing dates in a dream of Ibn Sirin’s married wife. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing dates as healing for the sick and happiness for the afflicted, and eating dates in a dream is evidence of An abundant blessing and goodness enjoyed by the dreamer and success that surrounds him from all sides. He now respects her and holds her all love and gratitude. Dates in a dream indicate good offspring and also indicate rain and a change in circumstances for the better. If a married woman eats a date with her partner, this symbolizes mutual understanding and respect between them and each of them’s desire to please the other, but if her companion refuses Dreaming about eating dates in her dream indicates that she does not eat healthy food and neglects her health a lot, and the dream portends the need to take care of her health. In order not to regret later. Collecting dates in the vision portends the dreamer that a female traveler will soon return from her relatives, and if a married woman sees dates on palm trees, this indicates the happy days and pleasant events that await her in the coming tomorrow. The specialized online dream interpretation site features a selection of the best Interpreters of dreams and vision in the Arab world. To access it, type Dream Interpretation Website on Google. Seeing dates in a dream for a pregnant woman. The interpretation of seeing dates in a dream for a pregnant woman is evidence that her future child will be good and fair. Scientists interpreted yellow dates in a dream as symbolizing the birth of males, and if the pregnant woman gathered Dates in her dream, it means that she will earn a lot of money after giving birth to her child. It negatively affects her thoughts and actions and perhaps he sees it as a warning for her to relax a little and try to think calmly about her problems. The most important interpretations of seeing dates in a dream for a married woman. Seeing eating dates in a dream for a married womanIt is said that eating dates in a dream indicates enjoyment of health and physical strength, and if a married woman eats dates In her dream, it means that she will soon find a solution to a certain problem that she has been suffering from for a long time. Among people. Seeing date seeds in a dream for a married woman. It is said that seeing date seeds is evidence that the married woman feels energetic and wants to try many things.

title: Interpretation of seeing a female turkey in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a female turkey in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Kathir, and Imam Al-Sadiq. Scientists and jurists interpreted dreams and visions through the vision website roy2a.com. This is for a single girl, married, pregnant, married, a single young woman and a divorced woman. What is the interpretation of seeing a turkey in a dream for a single girl? An unmarried girl sees a turkey in a dream. It indicates a lot of money, enormous wealth and status. Seeing a red turkey in a dream is a sign of marriage With her boyfriend and their strong attachment to each other, the black rooster symbolizes her intense hatred for her fiancé and their separation from each other, and the white rooster symbolizes happiness and very good things. Seeing a fat rooster in a dream indicates the dreamer’s patience, endurance, and determination to achieve his dreams and goals and his good reputation among people. See also: Interpretation Seeing a turkey in a dream: What is the interpretation of seeing a female turkey in a dream for a married woman? A married woman seeing a turkey in a dream indicates her husband’s devotion to him, his love, and his constant attention to her. Seeing a white rooster in a married woman’s dream is a sign of kindness, blessing, and abundant living for her husband. Seeing the sound of a turkey in a dream A dream is one of the promising visions that symbolize opening the door to great livelihood for the visionaries. Seeing a married woman receiving a turkey as a gift from someone she knows indicates her high status among people and her good life among them. See also: The interpretation of seeing a tablecloth in a dream. What is the interpretation of a man who sees a turkey in a dream? A dream? A man seeing a turkey in a dream indicates a prestigious position, whether at work or in social life, and the acquisition of many good things and a huge inheritance from a relative. Seeing a man slaughtering a large turkey in a dream is one of the happy visions that promise its owner abundant money and great success. Seeing a rooster A slaughtered turkey in a dream indicates his lack of interest in the teachings of his religion and his distance from reading the Qur’an and performing the five daily prayers. Seeing the transformation of the person you dream about indicates deterioration of health and the imminence of death. What is the interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman with a turkey in a dream? Seeing a pregnant woman with a turkey in In a dream, it indicates that the dreamer has many good children who will have a great future and a great position. Seeing turkey meat in a dream indicates lawful money and keeping away from the path of corruption. Seeing a turkey flying in a dream and its leaving the dreamer’s house is a sign that he has lost everything materially and socially. And its great status. Seeing a turkey in the market indicates that many positive changes will occur in the life of the visionary. Seeing yourself eating turkey meat in a dream is a sign of happy days soon. See also: Interpretation of seeing a Pharaonic statue in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a black turkey in a dream? Seeing a rooster A black turkey in a dream means good health and a blessing in livelihood and money. Seeing a slaughtered turkey in a dream is a sign that the dreamer will face huge problems and difficulties that are difficult to escape from. Seeing a black turkey in a dream symbolizes the presence of disagreements between the dreamer and his friends because of his position and power. A single girl sees a rooster.

title: Interpretation of dreams for reading in a dream for single, pregnant and married women

preview.html: Reading in a dream about single peopleDreamReading in a dreamA single girl has evidence of hesitation and inability to make decisions if the messages read are not understood. Seeing an unmarried girl reading clear letters in a dream is evidence of the communication that will occur between her and the young man who wants to communicate with her. It indicates Seeing readingIn a dream, this girl fulfills all her duties perfectly. The dream of reading also shows this girl’s open mind and her ability to receive information clearly. Seeing an unmarried girl reading a novel in a dream indicates an old relationship between her and a young man who will return again and end in marriage. Interpretation of reading in A dream about a married woman: Seeing a married woman reading a book in a dream means that she will get rid of the problems and obstacles she is going through. Seeing a married woman reading a magazine in a dream means that she is worried about some of the problems she is falling into. A dream about seeing her reading a newspaper is evidence that her expatriate relative will bring her some money. Reading in general in a dream is evidence of a happy marriage. Reading in a dream about a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman reading a newspaper in a dream means that you will hear good news. Seeing yourself reading a newspaper in a dream can be an indication of the abundance of money that you will have soon. Seeing reading In a dream, it indicates good offspring, especially if reading is enjoyable. Interpretation of a dream about reading for a woman in detail. If a woman sees in a dream that she is reading verses from the Qur’an and written on her clothes, this means that she is adhering to religion and following the path of God Almighty. As for the dream of reading some writings in bad and ugly handwriting It indicates the remorse that she feels about some work. As for seeing a woman reading a book and leafing through all the pages, it indicates profit from trade or gaining a prominent position in the work she offers. If a woman sees in her dream that she is reading some writings on her hand, this indicates repentance and staying away from... Sins.
